price: (Ey Firavun!) Senden sonra geleceklere ibret olman için, bugün senin bedenini (cansız olarak) kurtaracağız. İşte insanlardan bir çoğu, hakikaten âyetlerimizden gafildirler.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَةٗۚ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا لَغَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma nunajjīka bibadanika litakūna liman khalfaka āyatan wa-inna kathīran mina al-nāsi ʿan āyātinā laghāfilūna
